concept.title: About data entry
concept.shortdesc: Why using a form for data entry.

conbody.p: Records can be edited directly in the table, but this is not a recommended method for people who are not familiar with Access. You can easily make incorrect entries, especially in tables that are related to other tables. The recommended method is to perform data entry through a form. You can make a form user-friendly, provide explanatory text, and perform controls on the data in the background.
